selections.name: Cassenite
selections.reason: Consistent performer who ran a strong 2nd at this track/distance last start. Drawn perfectly in barrier 4 to get a soft run.

selections.name: Buderim
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell with solid trial form. Has shown ability in previous campaigns and looks the main danger.

selections.name: Maythisbetheone
selections.reason: Racing well with three consecutive placings. Consistent type who should be in the finish again.

selections.name: Longtimebeliever
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 2nd last start. Drawn well and stays in the mix.

danger_horse.name: Buderim
danger_horse.reason: Fresh horse with ability who could sprint well fresh.

selections.name: Coracao
selections.reason: Solid 2nd last start at this track over 7f. Drops back slightly in trip but has race fitness and a good draw.

selections.name: Leafice
selections.reason: Ran a decent 4th last start and gets blinkers on (check gear). Drawn to get a lovely run.

selections.name: Sponge Cake
selections.reason: William Pike takes the ride. Showed enough on debut to suggest improvement is likely here.

selections.name: Cosmic Gem
selections.reason: Experienced runner drawn low. Can improve on recent efforts in this field.

danger_horse.name: Leafice
danger_horse.reason: Improving type with a good barrier draw.

selections.name: Luna Ballet
selections.reason: Chased hard for 2nd last start at this track. Looks ready to win and the 7f suits.

selections.name: Jesa Lupa
selections.reason: William Pike rides. Has been consistent enough to feature in this maiden field.

selections.name: Sovereign Salute
selections.reason: Solid debut effort finishing 4th. Will be better for the experience and drawn well.

selections.name: Hope To Admire
selections.reason: Placed 3rd last start. Barrier is sticky but has claims on form.

selections.name: Streak Of God
selections.reason: William Pike aboard. Ran a promising 4th when resuming and the step up to the mile is ideal.

selections.name: Magic Carats
selections.reason: Consistent maiden performer. Placed two back and wasn't far away last start. Good draw.

selections.name: La Nocciola
selections.reason: Ran a nice 3rd last start. Light weight and good barrier bring her into contention.

selections.name: Vampi Queen
selections.reason: Drawn the rails. Had good form prior to last start and can bounce back.

selections.name: Hezangelic
selections.reason: Consistent sprinter who ran a narrow 2nd last start. Has the class to win this.

selections.name: So Immaculate
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track/distance. In good form and must be respected.

selections.name: Desert Life
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from a Listed race. Previous form was strong.

selections.name: Blue Can Talk
selections.reason: Drawn well in barrier 2. Can improve on recent efforts in this grade.

selections.name: Safedeel
selections.reason: Broke maiden status impressively last start. Chris Parnham sticks and drawn perfectly in barrier 2.

selections.name: Jazalot
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd last start. Drawn the inside and should get a lovely run.

selections.name: Aurora Queen
selections.reason: William Pike rides. Has shown ability and can feature in the finish.

selections.name: Solo Vega
selections.reason: Drops in class from a Listed race. Should find this much easier.
